column3: News;(Kratie):------ At least three people died suddenly and more than 30 others were hospitalized on the evening of October 18
column5: after drinking wine. ------ ------This happened at Phum Roeung village
column8: Kratie province. ------The authorities detained a wine maker in the village for questioning.------More than 30 victims were sent to hospital
column9: and police say investigations are still ongoing.------http://www.freshnewsasia.com/index.php/en/localnews/102264-2018-10-18-15-42-40.html
